alert.note: Alert for Central Lea County; Eddy County Plains; Guadalupe Mountains of Eddy County; Northern Lea County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 23 at 1:45AM MST until January 24 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM CST /8 PM MST/ THIS EVENING TO 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of southeast New Mexico and southwest and western Texas. * WHEN...From 9 PM CST /8 PM MST/ this evening to 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In New Mexico, the latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 800-432-4269. In Texas, the latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 800-452-9292.

area.areaDesc: Central Lea County; Eddy County Plains; Guadalupe Mountains of Eddy County; Northern Lea County
